comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Looking at the largest image of the photo, one can barely make out the story headline on the front page of the Miami Herald that reads "14 Killed In Crash [of] Soviet [SST]" (bracketed terms are ones I am assuming).  The story must refer to the crash of the Tupolev Tu-144 at the 1973 Paris Air Show on June 3, 1973.  All six of the crew on-board the Tu-144 were killed in the crash, as were eight people on the ground in a nearby Paris neighborhood where the wreckage came down. This would date the photo to June 4, 1973, or soon thereafter.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi TVL1970,

Thanks for your dedicated detective work on this photo!  We've changed the date on this photo to reflect your finding.  Keep up the good work!

Mary
(U.S. National Archives)
